org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api.mappers
Interface EntityColumnMapper

All Superinterfaces:
DataMapper
public interface EntityColumnMapper
extends DataMapper

Extension for the DataMapper which allows custom translation of persistent entity data into data maps and back

Author:
Aaron Zeckoski (azeckoski@gmail.com)

Field Summary
 
Fields inherited from interface org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api.mappers.DataMapper
DBTYPE_DB2, DBTYPE_DERBY, DBTYPE_HSQLDB, DBTYPE_MSSQL, DBTYPE_MYSQL, DBTYPE_ORACLE, DBTYPE_POSTGRES, DDL_COLUMN_PREFIX, DDL_ID_COLUMN, DDL_ID_SEQNAME, DDL_ID_TYPE_PREFIX, DDL_TABLENAME, DDL_TABLENAME_TYPE_PREFIX, DEFAULT_ID_COLUMN, DEFAULT_ID_PROPERTY
 
Method Summary
 Object mapColumnsToObject(Map<String,Object> columnsData)
          Called when the object is being pulled out of the database, this translates a map with column names and the data contained into a persistent object type
 Map<String,Object> mapObjectToColumns(Object persistentObject)
          Called when the object is being input into the database, this translates an object type to be persisted into a map of column names and values
 
Methods inherited from interface org.sakaiproject.genericdao.api.mappers.DataMapper
generateDDL, getIdPropertyName, getPersistentType, getPropertyToColumnNamesMapping, getTableName
 

Method Detail

mapObjectToColumns

Map<String,Object> mapObjectToColumns(Object persistentObject)
Called when the object is being input into the database, this translates an object type to be persisted into a map of column names and values

Parameters:
persistentObject - a persistent object
Returns:
a map of database column names to the values to place in those columns OR return null to have generic dao attempt to handle this automatically

mapColumnsToObject

Object mapColumnsToObject(Map<String,Object> columnsData)
Called when the object is being pulled out of the database, this translates a map with column names and the data contained into a persistent object type

Parameters:
columnsData - a map of database column names to the values in those columns
Returns:
a persistent object with the data from the columnsdata placed in it OR return null to have generic dao attempt to handle this automatically
